survey_brief: Assess consumer perceptions, concerns, and adoption readiness for autonomous vehicle technology

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with autonomous vehicle technology?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced 4-point scale to avoid neutral midpoint bias

script.question_text: How familiar are you with autonomous vehicle technology?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle as your primary mode of transportation within the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Include explicit timeframe for better decision anchoring
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with 'Prefer not to answer' optional

script.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle as your primary mode of transportation within the next 5 years?

questions.question_text: What are your primary concerns about autonomous vehicles? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Limit to 6 key options based on pilot study findings

script.question_text: What are your primary concerns about autonomous vehicles? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional factors would influence your decision to use autonomous vehicles?
questions.client_notes: Place after multiple-choice questions to capture nuanced responses
questions.scripter_notes: Open text field with 500 character limit

script.question_text: What additional factors would influence your decision to use autonomous vehicles?

questions.question_text: How much premium would you be willing to pay for autonomous features compared to a conventional vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use percentage ranges for easier comparability across regions
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with tooltip explanations on hover

script.question_text: How much premium would you be willing to pay for autonomous features compared to a conventional vehicle?

questions.question_text: Which autonomous vehicle service model are you most likely to use?
questions.client_notes: Include visual aid in digital survey versions

script.question_text: Which autonomous vehicle service model are you most likely to use?

questions.question_text: How important is third-party safety certification in building trust?
questions.client_notes: Follow with matrix question if expanding later
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons, randomize option order for 20% of respondents

script.question_text: How important is third-party safety certification in building trust?

questions.question_text: Do you currently use any advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS)?
questions.client_notes: Include tooltip with ADAS examples on hover

script.question_text: Do you currently use any advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS)?

questions.question_text: Which ADAS features do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Only show if Q8 answer is 'Yes'
questions.client_notes: Update options annually as technology evolves

script.question_text: Which ADAS features do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Only show if Q8 answer is 'Yes'

questions.question_text: How should autonomous vehicle manufacturers prioritize these development aspects?
questions.client_notes: Use drag-and-drop ranking for digital implementations
questions.scripter_notes: Implement as ranking question type if supported

script.question_text: How should autonomous vehicle manufacturers prioritize these development aspects?
